00044

00060 
00061 static void
00062 TestFreeImageAlgorithms_UtilityTest(CuTest* tc)
00063 {
00064         double min, max;
00065 
00066         char *file = IMAGE_DIR "\\24bit_colour.jpg";
00067 
00068         FIBITMAP *src;
00069 
00070         FIBITMAP *dib = FreeImageAlgorithms_LoadFIBFromFile(file);
00071         
00072         FreeImageAlgorithms_FindMinMaxForColourImage(dib, &min, &max);
00073 
00074         FreeImage_Unload(dib);
00075 
00076         CuAssertTrue(tc, min == 0.0);
00077         CuAssertTrue(tc, max == 255.0);
00078 }
00079 
00080 static void
00081 TestFreeImageAlgorithms_UtilityCompareTest(CuTest* tc)
00082 {
00083         double min, max;
00084 
00085         char *file = IMAGE_DIR "\\24bit_colour.jpg";
00086 
00087         FIBITMAP *dib1 = FreeImageAlgorithms_LoadFIBFromFile(file);
00088         FIBITMAP *dib2 = FreeImageAlgorithms_LoadFIBFromFile(file);
00089         FIBITMAP *dib3 = FreeImageAlgorithms_LoadFIBFromFile(IMAGE_DIR "\\24bit_colour_slight_change.jpg");
00090 
00091         int res = FreeImageAlgorithms_BitwiseCompare(dib1, dib2);
00092 
00093         CuAssertTrue(tc, res == 1);
00094 
00095         res = FreeImageAlgorithms_BitwiseCompare(dib1, dib3);
00096 
00097         CuAssertTrue(tc, res == 0);
00098 
00099         FreeImage_Unload(dib1);
00100         FreeImage_Unload(dib2);
00101         FreeImage_Unload(dib3);
00102 }

00105 CuSuite* DLL_CALLCONV
00106 CuGetFreeImageAlgorithmsUtilitySuite(void)
00107 {
00108         CuSuite* suite = CuSuiteNew();
00109 
00110         SUITE_ADD_TEST(suite, TestFreeImageAlgorithms_UtilityTest);
00111         SUITE_ADD_TEST(suite, TestFreeImageAlgorithms_UtilityCompareTest);
00112         //SUITE_ADD_TEST(suite, TestFreeImageAlgorithms_FindMinMaxTest);
00113         //SUITE_ADD_TEST(suite, BorderTest);
00114
